text.section:
On receipt of a petition, the clerk of the Tax Court immediately shall issue a subpoena that requires the appropriate tax determining agency to produce at a hearing before the Tax Court:
the record of the proceeding from which the appeal is taken or a certified copy of the record; and
any map, plat, or other document that is connected with the record.

On request of a party, the Tax Court shall issue a subpoena that requires at a hearing before the Tax Court:
the appearance of a witness to testify; and
the production of any pertinent document.
